title: Harmony Hall: Nearby Attractions
body: Nearby Attractions       Harmony Hall Regional Center www.pgparks.com/places/artsfac/hhrc.html Thomas Stone National Historic Site, Port Tobacco, Maryland www.nps.gov/thst Fort Washington Park, Fort Washington, Maryland www.nps.gov/fowa Fort Foote Park, Oxon Hill, Maryland www.nps.gov/fofo Harmony Hall, Silesia, Maryland www.nps.gov/haha George Washington's Mount Vernon, Alexandria, Virginia www.mountvernon.org Oxon Cove Park/Oxon Hill Farm www.nps.gov/oxhi
